title: Hollow Co3O4 nanospheres modified with RuCl3 as peroxidase mimics for sensitive determination of sulfide ions at neutral pH
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00569D, Paper
Daqing Chen, Minghui Li, Wanzhu Wang, Danhua Ge, Xiaojun Chen
Developing high-performance nanozymes at neutral pH is extremely necessary for the application of biological and water environmental systems. RuCl3 modified hollow Co3O4 nanospheres (Ru3+-Co3O4 HNSs) were utilized to establish a...
